product_name: Soleus Ultra Sole Digital Sports Watch - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight with large easy-to-read digits, the Ultra Sole watch resists water to 100 meters and sports an arsenal of workout-tracking features to keep you focused on personal goals in any weather.
